properties.title: The Islands of Brissago
properties.abstract: The botanical garden Isole di Brissago hosts many different species of plants from all five continents. Thanks to the special climate the gardens include over 1'600 different plants. The botanical collection has been carefully selected and acclimatised since the foundation of the garden in 1885.
properties.description:
The Islands of Brissago host the Ticino Canton Botanical Garden. Exotic plants, colours and sweet scents offer the visitors moments of emotion and relax. Here lovers of nature and the magnificent variety of the world of plants can find a countless choice of interesting examples. Thanks to the extraordinary climate conditions this garden hosts more than 1'700 different kinds of plants and flowers of subtropical origins and from all five continents presented in an inviting surrounding.

Individual guided tours and public guided tours are offered during the season. Embedded in the park there is the splendid Villa Emden which hosts a fine restaurant with a fantastic view of the lake, where overnight stays are also possible.
properties.name: Ascona-Locarno Turismo
